channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: All the Burning Questions We Have After ‘Avatar: Fire and Ash’
item.description: Let's dig deep into some spoilers for James Cameron's sci-fi action blockbuster, now in theaters.

item.title: Larry Ellison Revives Paramounts’ Bid on Warner as His Son Hollows Out CBS News
item.description: They're probably promising Trump a producer credit.

item.title: Arm sheds billions in market capitalization after Qualcomm hints at RISC-V adoption with Ventara Micro acquisition
item.description: Arm stock declines as Qualcomm picks up Ventana, raising questions about future customer reliance on Arm architectures.

item.title: ChatGPT launches a year-end review like Spotify Wrapped
item.description: The experience includes awards, poems, and pictures referencing your year in chat.

item.title: Spotify affirme que des activistes ont piraté son catalogue
item.description: Le service de diffusion musicale en continu Spotify a annoncé lundi avoir désactivé les comptes d’un groupe de pirates qui affirmait avoir « sauvegardé » des millions de fichiers musicaux et de métadonnées de la plateforme.

item.title: Indie Game Awards retracts Expedition 33 prizes due to generative AI
item.description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 had earned another Game of the Year award by the Indie Game Awards last week, but the organization has since announced that the award would be retracted because developer Sandfall Interactive used generative AI during development. The Indie Game Awards also rescinded the Debut Game award given to Expedition 33. Here […]

item.title: CEO of SpaceX rival United Launch Alliance resigns
item.description: Tory Bruno's abrupt departure comes after 12 years in the role. The company, a Boeing-Lockheed Martin joint venture, has had to fight to keep pace with Elon Musk's SpaceX.

item.title: Motherboards from Gigabyte, MSI, ASUS, ASRock at risk from new UEFI flaw attack - here's what we know
item.description: Many popular devices are now vulnerable to direct memory access attacks, but there is a patch.

item.title: Binance Still Processed $144 Million in Suspicious Crypto Payments After Plea Deal: Report
item.description: The crypto exchange has been under scrutiny for its links to terrorist group payments.

item.title: Mads Mikkelsen, Death Star Architect, Helps Brother, Grand Admiral Thrawn, Build Lego Death Star
item.description: The 'Rogue One' star teamed up with fellow 'Star Wars' actor Lars Mikkelsen for the construction.

item.title: Trump keeps investing millions of government money in 1 essential industry (and it’s not AI chips)
item.description: A new report shows how the feds are increasingly appearing on cap tables of U.S. companies. If you’ve sold equity in your company at some point, you’re probably used to keeping track of your cap table and knowing which shareholders have how big of a stake.

item.title: Gold and silver prices reached record highs today. Here’s what’s next for 2026
item.description: Spurred by political and economic factors, the price of gold has surged nearly 70% in 2025. How high could it rise next year? Gold and silver prices rose to record highs in early trading on Monday, spurred on by a confluence of a few different political events and economic factors, including tensions over the U.S. seizing of possibly a second oil tanker from Venezuela, speculation of future Federal Reserve rate cuts, overall economy insecurity, and bets on U.S. monetary policy in 2026....

item.title: J’ai testé le Vespera Pro de Vaonis, les meilleures images du ciel nocturne pour un télescope connecté ?
item.description: Les télescopes connectés sont de plus en plus nombreux sur le marché, mais Vaonis propose quelque chose d'assez unique avec sa gamme Vespera : un résultat bien plus proche de l'astrophotographie classique que ses concurrents. La version Pro promet encore une meilleure qualité d'images et une meilleure autonomie, mais aussi un prix plus élevé. Verdict ? ...

item.title: How U.S. tech built China’s surveillance state in Nepal
item.description: Intense surveillance has stifled the once-vibrant Free Tibet movement that had resonated around the world. The white dome of Boudhanath rises like a silent guardian over the chaotic sprawl of Nepal’s capital, Kathmandu, crowned by a golden spire that pierces the sky. Painted on each of the spire’s four sides are the benevolent eyes of the Buddha — wide, calm, and unblinking — said to see all that unfolds below....

item.title: Japan’s Flagship H3 Rocket Suffers Engine Bust, Fails to Deliver Satellite
item.description: This marks the second failed launch for the medium-lift vehicle since its explosive debut in 2023.

item.title: Sorti en Europe il y a moins de deux mois, le Vivo X300 se paie déjà une première belle réduction
item.description: Le Vivo X300 arrive en Europe avec une dalle Amoled de 6,3 pouces et des capteurs photo haut de gamme. Chez AliExpress, il s'offre une première promotion de 190 euros avec le code FRBD40.

item.title: It’s Game Over for the Steam Deck LCD (RIP 2022-2025)
item.description: The best bang-for-buck handheld is no more.

item.title: 3 reasons to start swimming if you're over 50 – and all the kit you'll need
item.description: Three science-backed reasons to dive into swimming – plus the simple kit that can make every session better.

item.title: On se retrouve au CES 2026 à Las Vegas pour débuter l’année sur de grosses bases, après 2 semaines de pause Twitch
item.description: Notre programme Twitch de la semaine du 22 décembre est une petite exception : Frandroidlive se met en pause le temps de deux semaines, mais reviendra de plus bel début janvier pour le CES 2026, organisé à Las Vegas.
